verses.verse: וַיַּקְהֵ֣ל <WH6950> together מֹשֶׁ֗ה <WH4872> And Moses אֶֽת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all עֲדַ֛ת <WH5712> all the congregation בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> and said אֲלֵהֶ֑ם <WH413> to אֵ֚לֶּה <WH428> These הַדְּבָרִ֔ים <WH1697> unto them These [are] the words אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after צִוָּ֥ה <WH6680> hath commanded יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> which the LORD לַעֲשֹׂ֥ת <WH6213> that [ye] should do אֹתָֽם׃ <WH853>

שֵׁ֣שֶׁת <WH8337> Six יָמִים֮ <WH3117> days תֵּעָשֶׂ֣ה <WH6213> be done מְלָאכָה֒ <WH4399> shall work וּבַיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> day הַשְּׁבִיעִ֗י <WH7637> but on the seventh יִהְיֶ֨ה <WH1961> shall have לָכֶ֥ם קֹ֛דֶשׁ <WH6944> there shall be to you an holy day שַׁבַּ֥ת <WH7676> a sabbath שַׁבָּת֖וֹן <WH7677> of rest לַיהוָ֑ה <WH3068> to the LORD כָּל־ <WH3605> whoever הָעֹשֶׂ֥ה <WH6213> whosoever doeth ב֛וֹ מְלָאכָ֖ה <WH4399> work יוּמָֽת׃ <WH4191> therein shall be put to death

לֹא־ <WH3808> shall not תְבַעֲר֣וּ <WH1197> Ye shall kindle אֵ֔שׁ <WH784> no fire בְּכֹ֖ל <WH3605> any מֹשְׁבֹֽתֵיכֶ֑ם <WH4186> throughout your habitations בְּי֖וֹם <WH3117> day הַשַּׁבָּֽת׃ <WH7676> upon the sabbath פ

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> spake מֹשֶׁ֔ה <WH4872> And Moses אֶל־ <WH413> to כָּל־ <WH3605> all עֲדַ֥ת <WH5712> unto all the congregation בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying זֶ֣ה <WH2088> This הַדָּבָ֔ר <WH1697> This [is] the thing אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which צִוָּ֥ה <WH6680> commanded יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> which the LORD לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

קְח֨וּ <WH3947> Take מֵֽאִתְּכֶ֤ם <WH853> תְּרוּמָה֙ <WH8641> ye from among you an offering לַֽיהוָ֔ה <WH3068> unto the LORD כֹּ֚ל <WH3605> whosoever נְדִ֣יב <WH5081> [is] of a willing לִבּ֔וֹ <WH3820> heart יְבִיאֶ֕הָ <WH935> let him bring אֵ֖ת <WH853> תְּרוּמַ֣ת <WH8641> it an offering יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD זָהָ֥ב <WH2091> gold וָכֶ֖סֶף <WH3701> and silver וּנְחֹֽשֶׁת׃ <WH5178> and brass
וּתְכֵ֧לֶת <WH8504> And blue וְאַרְגָּמָ֛ן <WH713> and purple וְתוֹלַ֥עַת <WH8438> oppressor שָׁנִ֖י <WH8144> and scarlet וְשֵׁ֥שׁ <WH8336> and fine linen וְעִזִּֽים׃ <WH5795> and goats'
וְעֹרֹ֨ת <WH5785> skins אֵילִ֧ם <WH352> And rams' מְאָדָּמִ֛ים <WH119> dyed red וְעֹרֹ֥ת <WH5785> skins תְּחָשִׁ֖ים <WH8476> and badgers' וַעֲצֵ֥י <WH6086> wood שִׂטִּֽים׃ <WH7848> and shittim

וְשֶׁ֖מֶן <WH8081> And oil לַמָּא֑וֹר <WH3974> for the light וּבְשָׂמִים֙ <WH1314> and spices לְשֶׁ֣מֶן <WH8081> oil הַמִּשְׁחָ֔ה <WH4888> for anointing וְלִקְטֹ֖רֶת <WH7004> incense הַסַּמִּֽים׃ <WH5561> and for the sweet
וְאַ֨בְנֵי־ <WH68> stones שֹׁ֔הַם <WH7718> And onyx וְאַבְנֵ֖י <WH68> and stones מִלֻּאִ֑ים <WH4394> to be set לָאֵפ֖וֹד <WH646> for the ephod וְלַחֹֽשֶׁן׃ <WH2833> and for the breastplate

וְכָל־ <WH3605> every חֲכַם־ <WH2450> And every wise לֵ֖ב <WH3820> hearted בָּכֶ֑ם יָבֹ֣אוּ <WH935> among you shall come וְיַעֲשׂ֔וּ <WH6213> and make אֵ֛ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> after צִוָּ֖ה <WH6680> hath commanded יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> all that the LORD

אֶת־ <WH853> הַ֨מִּשְׁכָּ֔ן <WH4908> The tabernacle אֶֽת־ <WH853> אָהֳל֖וֹ <WH168> his tent וְאֶת־ <WH853> מִכְסֵ֑הוּ <WH4372> and his covering אֶת־ <WH853> קְרָסָיו֙ <WH7165> his taches וְאֶת־ <WH853> קְרָשָׁ֔יו <WH7175> and his boards אֶת־ <WH853> בְּרִיחָ֕ו <WH1280> his bars אֶת־ <WH853> עַמֻּדָ֖יו <WH5982> his pillars וְאֶת־ <WH853> אֲדָנָֽיו׃ <WH134> and his sockets

אֶת־ <WH853> הָאָרֹ֥ן <WH727> The ark וְאֶת־ <WH853> בַּדָּ֖יו <WH905> and the staves אֶת־ <WH853> הַכַּפֹּ֑רֶת <WH3727> thereof [with] the mercy seat וְאֵ֖ת <WH853> פָּרֹ֥כֶת <WH6532> and the vail הַמָּסָֽךְ׃ <WH4539> of the covering

אֶת־ <WH853> הַשֻּׁלְחָ֥ן <WH7979> The table וְאֶת־ <WH853> בַּדָּ֖יו <WH905> and his staves וְאֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and all כֵּלָ֑יו <WH3627> and all his vessels וְאֵ֖ת <WH853> לֶ֥חֶם <WH3899> and the bread הַפָּנִֽים׃ <WH6440> of the Presence

וְאֶת־ <WH853> מְנֹרַ֧ת <WH4501> The candlestick הַמָּא֛וֹר <WH3974> also for the light וְאֶת־ <WH853> כֵּלֶ֖יהָ <WH3627> and his furniture וְאֶת־ <WH853> נֵרֹתֶ֑יהָ <WH5216> and his lamps וְאֵ֖ת <WH853> שֶׁ֥מֶן <WH8081> with the oil הַמָּאֽוֹר׃ <WH3974> for the light

וְאֶת־ <WH853> מִזְבַּ֤ח <WH4196> altar הַקְּטֹ֙רֶת֙ <WH7004> And the incense וְאֶת־ <WH853> בַּדָּ֔יו <WH905> and his staves וְאֵת֙ <WH853> שֶׁ֣מֶן <WH8081> oil הַמִּשְׁחָ֔ה <WH4888> and the anointing וְאֵ֖ת <WH853> קְטֹ֣רֶת <WH7004> incense הַסַּמִּ֑ים <WH5561> and the sweet וְאֶת־ <WH853> מָסַ֥ךְ <WH4539> and the hanging הַפֶּ֖תַח <WH6607> for the door at the entering in לְפֶ֥תַח <WH6607> the entrance הַמִּשְׁכָּֽן׃ <WH4908> of the tabernacle

אֵ֣ת ׀ <WH853> מִזְבַּ֣ח <WH4196> The altar הָעֹלָ֗ה <WH5930> of burnt offering וְאֶת־ <WH854> for מִכְבַּ֤ר <WH4345> grate הַנְּחֹ֙שֶׁת֙ <WH5178> with his brasen אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after ל֔וֹ אֶת־ <WH853> בַּדָּ֖יו <WH905> his staves וְאֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and all כֵּלָ֑יו <WH3627> and all his vessels אֶת־ <WH853> הַכִּיֹּ֖ר <WH3595> the laver וְאֶת־ <WH853> כַּנּֽוֹ׃ <WH3653> and his foot

אֵ֚ת <WH853> קַלְעֵ֣י <WH7050> The hangings הֶחָצֵ֔ר <WH2691> of the court אֶת־ <WH853> עַמֻּדָ֖יו <WH5982> his pillars וְאֶת־ <WH853> אֲדָנֶ֑יהָ <WH134> and their sockets וְאֵ֕ת <WH853> מָסַ֖ךְ <WH4539> and the hanging שַׁ֥עַר <WH8179> for the door הֶחָצֵֽר׃ <WH2691> of the court

אֶת־ <WH853> יִתְדֹ֧ת <WH3489> The pins הַמִּשְׁכָּ֛ן <WH4908> of the tabernacle וְאֶת־ <WH853> יִתְדֹ֥ת <WH3489> and the pins הֶחָצֵ֖ר <WH2691> of the court וְאֶת־ <WH853> מֵיתְרֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH4340> and their cords

אֶת־ <WH853> בִּגְדֵ֥י <WH899> The cloths הַשְּׂרָ֖ד <WH8278> of service לְשָׁרֵ֣ת <WH8334> to do service בַּקֹּ֑דֶשׁ <WH6944> in the holy אֶת־ <WH853> בִּגְדֵ֤י <WH899> garments הַקֹּ֙דֶשׁ֙ <WH6944> [place] the holy לְאַהֲרֹ֣ן <WH175> for Aaron הַכֹּהֵ֔ן <WH3548> the priest וְאֶת־ <WH853> בִּגְדֵ֥י <WH899> and the garments בָנָ֖יו <WH1121> of his sons לְכַהֵֽן׃ <WH3547> to minister in the priest's office

וַיֵּ֥צְא֛וּ <WH3318> departed כָּל־ <WH3605> all עֲדַ֥ת <WH5712> And all the congregation בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel מִלִּפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> from the presence מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <WH4872> of Moses

וַיָּבֹ֕אוּ <WH935> And they came כָּל־ <WH3605> and everyone אִ֖ישׁ <WH376> every one אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> whose נְשָׂא֣וֹ <WH5375> stirred him up לִבּ֑וֹ <WH3820> heart וְכֹ֡ל <WH3605> and for all אֲשֶׁר֩ <WH834> whose נָדְבָ֨ה <WH5068> made willing רוּח֜וֹ <WH7307> and every one whom his spirit אֹת֗וֹ <WH853> הֵ֠בִיאוּ <WH935> [and] they brought אֶת־ <WH853> תְּרוּמַ֨ת <WH8641> offering יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> the LORD'S לִמְלֶ֨אכֶת <WH4399> to the work אֹ֤הֶל <WH168> of the tabernacle מוֹעֵד֙ <WH4150> of the congregation וּלְכָל־ <WH3605> and everyone עֲבֹ֣דָת֔וֹ <WH5656> and for all his service וּלְבִגְדֵ֖י <WH899> garments הַקֹּֽדֶשׁ׃ <WH6944> and for the holy

וַיָּבֹ֥אוּ <WH935> And they came הָאֲנָשִׁ֖ים <WH582> men עַל־ <WH5921> both הַנָּשִׁ֑ים <WH802> and women כֹּ֣ל ׀ <WH3605> as many as נְדִ֣יב <WH5081> were willing לֵ֗ב <WH3820> hearted הֵ֠בִיאוּ <WH935> [and] brought חָ֣ח <WH2397> bracelets וָנֶ֜זֶם <WH5141> and earrings וְטַבַּ֤עַת <WH2885> and rings וְכוּמָז֙ <WH3558> and tablets כָּל־ <WH3605> all כְּלִ֣י <WH3627> all jewels זָהָ֔ב <WH2091> of gold וְכָל־ <WH3605> so every אִ֕ישׁ <WH376> and every man אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> who הֵנִ֛יף <WH5130> that offered תְּנוּפַ֥ת <WH8573> [offered] an offering זָהָ֖ב <WH2091> of gold לַיהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> unto the LORD

וְכָל־ <WH3605> Every אִ֞ישׁ <WH376> And every man אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who נִמְצָ֣א <WH4672> with whom was found אִתּ֗וֹ <WH854> his possession תְּכֵ֧לֶת <WH8504> blue וְאַרְגָּמָ֛ן <WH713> and purple וְתוֹלַ֥עַת <WH8438> oppressor שָׁנִ֖י <WH8144> and scarlet וְשֵׁ֣שׁ <WH8336> and fine linen וְעִזִּ֑ים <WH5795> and goats' וְעֹרֹ֨ת <WH5785> skins אֵילִ֧ם <WH352> of rams מְאָדָּמִ֛ים <WH119> [hair] and red וְעֹרֹ֥ת <WH5785> skins תְּחָשִׁ֖ים <WH8476> and badgers' הֵבִֽיאוּ׃ <WH935> brought

כָּל־ <WH3605> Everyone מֵרִ֗ים <WH7311> Every one that did offer תְּר֤וּמַת <WH8641> an offering כֶּ֙סֶף֙ <WH3701> of silver וּנְחֹ֔שֶׁת <WH5178> and brass הֵבִ֕יאוּ <WH935> brought אֵ֖ת <WH853> תְּרוּמַ֣ת <WH8641> offering יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD'S וְכֹ֡ל <WH3605> and every אֲשֶׁר֩ <WH834> who נִמְצָ֨א <WH4672> and every man with whom was found אִתּ֜וֹ <WH854> his possession עֲצֵ֥י <WH6086> wood שִׁטִּ֛ים <WH7848> shittim לְכָל־ <WH3605> any מְלֶ֥אכֶת <WH4399> for any work הָעֲבֹדָ֖ה <WH5656> of the service הֵבִֽיאוּ׃ <WH935> brought

וְכָל־ <WH3605> All אִשָּׁ֥ה <WH802> And all the women חַכְמַת־ <WH2450> that were wise לֵ֖ב <WH3820> hearted בְּיָדֶ֣יהָ <WH3027> with their hands טָו֑וּ <WH2901> did spin וַיָּבִ֣יאוּ <WH935> and brought מַטְוֶ֗ה <WH4299> that which they had spun אֶֽת־ <WH853> הַתְּכֵ֙לֶת֙ <WH8504> [both] of blue וְאֶת־ <WH853> הָֽאַרְגָּמָ֔ן <WH713> and of purple אֶת־ <WH853> תּוֹלַ֥עַת <WH8438> oppressor הַשָּׁנִ֖י <WH8144> scarlet וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַשֵּֽׁשׁ׃ <WH8336> and of fine linen

וְכָל־ <WH3605> All הַ֨נָּשִׁ֔ים <WH802> And all the women אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> whose נָשָׂ֥א <WH5375> stirred לִבָּ֛ן <WH3820> whose heart אֹתָ֖נָה <WH853> בְּחָכְמָ֑ה <WH2451> them up in wisdom טָו֖וּ <WH2901> spun אֶת־ <WH853> הָעִזִּֽים׃ <WH5795> goats'

וְהַנְּשִׂאִ֣ם <WH5387> And the rulers הֵבִ֔יאוּ <WH935> brought אֵ֚ת <WH853> אַבְנֵ֣י <WH68> stones הַשֹּׁ֔הַם <WH7718> onyx וְאֵ֖ת <WH853> אַבְנֵ֣י <WH68> and stones הַמִּלֻּאִ֑ים <WH4394> to be set לָאֵפ֖וֹד <WH646> for the ephod וְלַחֹֽשֶׁן׃ <WH2833> and for the breastplate

וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַבֹּ֖שֶׂם <WH1314> And spice וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַשָּׁ֑מֶן <WH8081> and oil לְמָא֕וֹר <WH3974> for the light וּלְשֶׁ֙מֶן֙ <WH8081> oil הַמִּשְׁחָ֔ה <WH4888> and for the anointing וְלִקְטֹ֖רֶת <WH7004> incense הַסַּמִּֽים׃ <WH5561> and for the sweet

כָּל־ <WH3605> all אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> every man וְאִשָּׁ֗ה <WH802> and woman אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> whose נָדַ֣ב <WH5068> made them willing לִבָּם֮ <WH3820> heart אֹתָם֒ <WH853> לְהָבִיא֙ <WH935> brought לְכָל־ <WH3605> for all הַמְּלָאכָ֔ה <WH4399> for all manner of work אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which צִוָּ֧ה <WH6680> had commanded יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> unto the LORD לַעֲשׂ֖וֹת <WH6213> to be made בְּיַד־ <WH3027> by the hand מֹשֶׁ֑ה <WH4872> of Moses הֵבִ֧יאוּ <WH935> to bring בְנֵי־ <WH1121> The children יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <WH3478> of Israel נְדָבָ֖ה <WH5071> a willing offering לַיהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> which the LORD פ

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said מֹשֶׁה֙ <WH4872> And Moses אֶל־ <WH413> to בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel רְא֛וּ <WH7200> See קָרָ֥א <WH7121> hath called יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> the LORD בְּשֵׁ֑ם <WH8034> by name בְּצַלְאֵ֛ל <WH1212> Bezaleel בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son אוּרִ֥י <WH221> of Uri בֶן־ <WH1121> the son ח֖וּר <WH2354> of Hur לְמַטֵּ֥ה <WH4294> of the tribe יְהוּדָֽה׃ <WH3063> of Judah

וַיְמַלֵּ֥א <WH4390> And he hath filled אֹת֖וֹ <WH853> ר֣וּחַ <WH7307> him with the spirit אֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> of God בְּחָכְמָ֛ה <WH2451> in wisdom בִּתְבוּנָ֥ה <WH8394> in understanding וּבְדַ֖עַת <WH1847> and in knowledge וּבְכָל־ <WH3605> all מְלָאכָֽה׃ <WH4399> and in all manner of workmanship
וְלַחְשֹׁ֖ב <WH2803> And to devise מַֽחַשָׁבֹ֑ת <WH4284> curious works לַעֲשֹׂ֛ת <WH6213> to work בַּזָּהָ֥ב <WH2091> in gold וּבַכֶּ֖סֶף <WH3701> and in silver וּבַנְּחֹֽשֶׁת׃ <WH5178> and in brass

וּבַחֲרֹ֥שֶׁת <WH2799> And in the cutting אֶ֛בֶן <WH68> of stones לְמַלֹּ֖את <WH4390> to set וּבַחֲרֹ֣שֶׁת <WH2799> [them] and in carving עֵ֑ץ <WH6086> of wood לַעֲשׂ֖וֹת <WH6213> to make בְּכָל־ <WH3605> every מְלֶ֥אכֶת <WH4399> work מַחֲשָֽׁבֶת׃ <WH4284> any manner of cunning

וּלְהוֹרֹ֖ת <WH3384> that he may teach נָתַ֣ן <WH5414> And he hath put בְּלִבּ֑וֹ <WH3820> in his heart ה֕וּא <WH1931> he וְאָֽהֳלִיאָ֥ב <WH171> [both] he and Aholiab בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son אֲחִיסָמָ֖ךְ <WH294> of Ahisamach לְמַטֵּה־ <WH4294> of the tribe דָֽן׃ <WH1835> of Dan

מִלֵּ֨א <WH4390> Them hath he filled אֹתָ֜ם <WH853> חָכְמַת־ <WH2451> with wisdom לֵ֗ב <WH3820> of heart לַעֲשׂוֹת֮ <WH6213> to work כָּל־ <WH3605> any מְלֶ֣אכֶת <WH4399> all manner of work חָרָ֣שׁ ׀ <WH2796> of the engraver וְחֹשֵׁב֒ <WH2803> and of the cunning workman וְרֹקֵ֞ם <WH7551> and of the embroiderer בַּתְּכֵ֣לֶת <WH8504> in blue וּבָֽאַרְגָּמָ֗ן <WH713> and in purple בְּתוֹלַ֧עַת <WH8438> oppressor הַשָּׁנִ֛י <WH8144> scarlet וּבַשֵּׁ֖שׁ <WH8336> and in fine linen וְאֹרֵ֑ג <WH707> and of the weaver עֹשֵׂי֙ <WH6213> [even] of them that do כָּל־ <WH3605> of every מְלָאכָ֔ה <WH4399> work וְחֹשְׁבֵ֖י <WH2803> and of those that devise מַחֲשָׁבֹֽת׃ <WH4284> cunning work
